article: prime minister ariel sharon presented a sweeping defense of his plan to remove israeli troops and settlers from the gaza strip and parts of the west bank , saying he has to fend off increasing international pressure , protect israel and prevent a palestinian humanitarian disaster .
abstract: sharon says israel must withdraw from areas it will not control after peace accord
